attributes.action: issue date so  certain EU Nationals cannot stay here after we leave EU
attributes.additional_details: live in Boston which has got migrants arriving daily, all under impression that they can stay after exit,our town is not on its own being swamped with migrants,everything is overwhelmed schools doctors etc we are leaving so issue a date so that all the EU know that all EU nationals cannot just come  here now and expect to be allowed to stop, migration  now will go even higher as all think they have the right to come and stay,voters will be watching as to what will happening
attributes.background: voted leave June 2016 yet 1000's of migrants still flooding UK why?met 1 family came last week asked why?EU says we can come, you would not dare send us back!!  his words not mine,need  date so that all EU know that after this date you will be sent home,otherwise 500000+will arrive nothing we can do

rejection.details:
It isn't clear what you mean by certain EU nationals. 

If you don't want the UK to retain freedom of movement with the EU, you could sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/154593
